name: Toschas
description:
Toschas is a group of young and talented enthusiasts developing startups and creating large-scale business applications for customers all over the world. We own great experience combined with love and awareness of new trends which we always try to follow - both programming and design. The big decision was to focus on Rails and AngularJS apps, which we follow since 2013.
Along the way, we also developed a couple of our own business solutions which can be seen at our website: www.toschas.com
